betaText: Vær opmærksom på at vi kan blive nødt til at slette data eller kompromitere funktionalitet.
commentsAllowed: Tillad at andre kommenterer mine flyvninger
competitionIdFormat: Kun alfanummeriske karakterer er tilladt i konkurrencenummeret.
cupDragText: Træk en CUP-fil hertil for at uploade, eller eller klik for at vælge
cupDropText: Træk en CUP-fil hertil for at uploade
enableOpenInSeeYou: Tillad at mine flyvninger kan åbnes i SeeYou
encourage: Lad os lette sammen og blive en del af fremtidens svæveflyveplatform.
errorCaptcha: Løs venligst captchaen for at bekræfte, at du er et menneske.
errorServer: Prøv igen senere eller kontakt os
favoriteFilterShortcut: Vælg op til fire favorit-filtre som genvej på startsiden:
fileValid: Ingen bemærkninger til analysen af denne flyvning.
flightEditLockedNotice: Redigeringsperioden for scoring af relevante bidrag er overstået.

flightErrors.AVG_GNSS_ALT_CHANGE: Gennemsnitlig GNSS-højdeændring mellem logs i din fil er {0}, Minimum er {1}.
flightErrors.AVG_PRESS_ALT_CHANGE: Gennemsnitlig trykhøjdeændring mellem logs i din fil er {0}, minimum er {1}.
flightErrors.C_RECORD_TOO_LONG: C registrering indeholder mere end 20 linjer, opgaven kan ikke analyseres.
flightErrors.FIXES_BEFORE_TAKEOFF: Fandt {0} logs før start, minimum er {1}.
flightErrors.GNSS_ALT_VIOLATIONS: GNSS-højdeområdet fra {0} til {1} er overskredet i {2} GNSS-fix.
flightErrors.HIGH_CHANGE_GNSS_ALT: {0} store ændringer i GNSS-højden (mere end {1} m/s).
flightErrors.HIGH_CHANGE_PRESS_ALT: {0} store ændringer i trykhøjde (mere end {1} m/s).
flightErrors.H_RECORD_NO_DATE: Der er ikke angivet nogen dato i H registreringen.
flightErrors.INVALID_QNH_VALUE: Den beregnede QNH på {0} hPa (baseret på den angivne højde) ligger ikke mellem grænserne på {1} hPa og {2} hPa.
flightErrors.MAX_GNSS_ALT_REACHED: Maks. GNSS-sensorhøjde er: {0}, du har nået: {1}
flightErrors.MAX_GROUND_SPEED_WARNING: Ground speed på {0} km/t ved {1} overskrider maksimum på {2} km/t, tilsvarende rettelser filtreres fra.
flightErrors.MAX_PRESS_ALT_REACHED: Maksimal tryksensorhøjde er: {0}, du har nået: {1}
flightErrors.NO_ENGINE_SENSOR: Ingen motor-sensor er fundet, tilladte motor-sensore: {0}.
flightErrors.NO_FES_SENSOR: Ingen FES-sensor er fundet, tilladte FES-sensore: {0}.
flightErrors.NO_SCORING_WINDOWS: Der er ikke fundet et scorings-vindue
flightErrors.PRESS_ALT_NOT_VALID: Trykhøjden i filen er ikke gyldig, den maksimale værdi er {0} meter.
flightErrors.PRESS_ALT_VIOLATIONS: Trykhøjdeområdet fra {0} til {1} er overskredet i {2} logs.
flightErrors.RAW_TIME_HARD_LIMIT_ALMOST_EXCEEDED: Hård tidsbegrænsning ({0} sekunder) mellem logs næsten overskredet ved {1}, interval uden logning er {2} sekunder.
flightErrors.RAW_TIME_HARD_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Hård tidsbegrænsning ({0} sekunder) mellem logs overskredet ved {1}, interval uden logning er {2} sekunder.
flightErrors.RAW_TIME_HARD_LIMIT_EXCEEDED_OUTSIDE_SCO: Hård tidsbegrænsning ({0} sekunder) mellem logs overskredet uden for scoringsintervaller ved {1}, interval uden logning er {2} sekunder.
flightErrors.RAW_TIME_SOFT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: {0} intervaller overskrider den bløde tidsgrænse mellem logs ({1}sek.), tilladte {2} intervaller.
flightErrors.OLC_FILE: Filen er blevet modificeret af OLC, upload venligst den originale fil
flightErrors.LXV_DOUBLE_SEATER: Filer fra en LXNAV enhed i bagsædet kan ikke valideres, venligst upload en fil fra forsædet.

igcDragText: Træk .igc-filer hertil for at uploade, eller klik for at vælge
imageDragText: Træk billeder hertil for at uploade, eller klik for at vælge
imageDropText: Smid billeder her for at uploade
instructionsEmailed: Email er sendt, følg venligst instruktionerne i den modtagede email.
integrateCopilot: Forbind din COPILOT profil i WeGlide
isNotRegistered: er ikke registreret, ingen yderligere autentificering påkrævet.
isRegistered: er registreret, fødselsdag er påkrævet for autentificering.
joinThanks: Tak for at være en del af WeGlide!
liveConnectHelp: Forbind din svæveflyver for at dukke op i Live tracking med din profil og deklarerede opgave.
name: Navn
noFlightsMapYet: Endnu ingen flyvninger i dette kortudsnit.
noTaskInFile: Ingen gyldig opgave fundet i filen
noTasks: Ingen opgaver endnu, planlæg en ny!
profileImageDragText: Træk dit nye profilbillede hertil for at uploade, eller klik for at vælge
profileImageDropText: Smid dit nye profilbillede her for at uploade
registrationFormat: Kun store bogstaver, tal og '-' er tilladt til registrering.
resetComplete: Nulstilling af kodeord gennemført, log venligst ind.
resetInvalid: Linket til nulstilling af adgangskode er ikke længere gyldigt. Anmod venligst om et nyt.
scoringEngineNotice: Fly med motor er valgt. Check venligst at motorkørsler (gul) er blevet korrekt registreret.
scoringFesNotice: Fly med elektisk motor valgt. Check venligst at motorkørsler (gul) er blevet korrekt registreret.
scoringGliderNotice: Fly uden motor er valgt, skift til fly med motor for at se motorkørsler.
taskLockedNotice: Kan ikke redigere opgaven fordi den er deklareret.
textConfirm: Jeg har læst og accepterer følgende dokumenter:
textConfirmUpload: Jeg bekræfter, at mine scoringsvinduer er valgt i henhold til reglerne, at hver krydsning af aktivt luftrum blev godkendt af flyveledere, og at jeg har læst og accepteret følgende dokumenter:
unauthorizedNotice: Du er ikke logget ind, angiv venligst din fødselsdag og fulde navn for at uploade, hvis du har en bruger eller
urgeVerify: Bekræft venligst din e-mail ved at klikke på linket i den e-mail, du har modtaget.
verifyInstructions: Hvis du ikke har modtaget en e-mail, bedes du vente et øjeblik og tjekke din spam-mappe eller kontakte os på
confirmCollectionDuplication: Vil du kopiere denne samling til din??
barogramRangeHelp: Zoom og træk her for at vælge rækkevidde
automaticRenewal: Dit abonnement bliver automatisk fornyet d. {date}.
automaticExpiration: Dit abonnement er blevet opsagt og udløber d. {date}. Du kan abonnerer igen efter denne dato.
upgradeTeaser: Opgrader din WeGlide oplevelse med unikke og kraftfulde værktøjer.
futurePlans: Lær mere om vores fremtidige planer
startCollectingFlights: Begynd at samle flyvninger med dette symbol
noCertificatesYet: No certificates yet, start uploading flights to earn your first one.

barogramHelp.thermalBank: Average glider bank and circling direction
barogramHelp.glideDetour: Gliding detour along the scoring route

subscription.planUpgradePrompt: Your subscription will be upgraded now.
subscription.planDowngradePrompt: Your subscription will be downgraded at the end of the billing period.
subscription.trialPaymentNotice: Payment method will not be charged during the trial period, cancel at any time.
subscription.3dFlightViewDescription: Lean back and relive any flight in 3D.
subscription.hdSatelliteDescription: Aerial imagery maps from Esri, Airbus, USGS and Maxar.
subscription.weatherSatelliteDescription: Animated high frequency weather satellite imagery.
subscription.weatherSatelliteFrequencyWorld: 10 minute scan for the rest of the world
subscription.statisticsListDescription: Compare yourself to others or track your progress over time. Complementary list type which includes the following statistics for easy comparison between flights.
subscription.phaseAnalysisDescription: Check out the thermals one by one and analyze the different glide phases in depth.
subscription.phaseAnalysisPhases: Marked thermals, thermal attempts and glide phases in map and barogram
subscription.phaseAnalysisStatistics: Detailed statistical evaluation for each phase
subscription.phaseAnalysisSection: Viewable per flight phase or per chosen section across phases
subscription.phaseAnalysisLive: Also available for flights in WeGlide Live
subscription.dayReplayDescription: Toggle the glider traffic accompanying a flight. View the decisions of other pilots while hovering over the barogram.
subscription.dayReplayValues: Show the replay with MSL, AGL, climb or 1h speed for each glider
subscription.dayReplayLocation: Display all flights or only those from your home airport
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsDescription: Spontaneous race between friends from your local airport or big competition, host your own!
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsPlan: Plan or upload a competition task
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsScore: Score every flight from one day or airport
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsRankings: Automated pilot rankings for each task
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsRules: Choose your rules: Classic, AAT, or Grand Prix
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsStatistics: Compare your task performance with the statistics list
subscription.waypointCollectionsDescription: Organize your own waypoints into collections for individual task planning.
subscription.waypointCollectionsManage: Upload existing CUP-files or create waypoints manually
subscription.waypointCollectionsKeyboard: Plan tasks quicker by typing waypoint names
subscription.waypointCollectionsPublic: Release a collection for all users
subscription.collectionsDescription: Bundle flights to beautiful, sharable collections. How about collecting:
subscription.collectionsTrip: Your once in a lifetime gliding trip
subscription.collectionsPreparation: Preparation flights for your next big gliding goal
subscription.profileBadgeDescription: Display your generosity with the handcrafted badge in your profile picture.
subscription.profileBadgeEnable: Can be enabled in your profile settings
subscription.earlyBirdAccessDescription: Contact us for access to features before they become available to the public.
subscription.earlyBirdAccessFuture: Shape the future of WeGlide with your feedback
subscription.missSomethingDescription: We are eager to chat with you and improve.
subscription.landingOpportunitiesDescription: Interactive arrival altitude for every airport along your way.
subscription.landingOpportunitiesLearn: Learn which options you had at any point during your flight
subscription.landingOpportunitiesCheck: Check if the decisions you made were safe
subscription.landingOpportunitiesImprove: Improve by thinking about alternatives after the flight
subscription.thermalReplayDescription: All the thermals of a day. See single thermals appear around you while hovering over the barogram.
subscription.thermalReplayDetours: Analyze where the worthwhile detours would have been
subscription.thermalReplayAnimated: Up to thousands of different thermals for every Minute of flight
subscription.thermalReplayClickable: Clicking thermals leads to the corresponding flight

tryStatisticsList: Try the statistics list for free
declarationTeaser: Declare a task and get up to 70% bonus points in national competitions or participate in local competitions.
taskDeclarationWarning: This will overwrite all declarations in your logger and on WeGlide.
listShortenedZoom: List shortened, zoom closer to display more flights.
noClubWarning: No club selected, uploaded flights will not be assigned to any club.
plansHeadline: Bring your flying skills to the next level
searchWaypointCollection: Search collections from you and others
addWaypointInstructions: ...or select the location for a new waypoint on the map and enter a name.
searchOrSelectOnMap: Search or select on the map
searchOrDragOnMap: Search or drag on the map
noLocalCompetitions: No local competitions yet, create a new one from one of your tasks.
noWaypoints: No waypoints yet, edit this collection and add some.
notificationDescription: New comments or flights from your friends directly to this device.
pushUnsupported: This browser does not support push notifications.
pushDenied: This browser does not allow WeGlide to send push notifications.
pushEnabling: Please wait, Push notifications are being activated. This may take up to a minute.
pushUnsupportedIOS: Push notifications require at least iOS 16.4 and adding WeGlide to your Home Screen.
unsavedChangesWarning: You are about to leave this page. Unsaved changes will be discarded.
userMessageDeliveryExplanation: I understand that my email address will be shared with the recipient and I acknowledge that I have read and agree to the following documents:
userMessagesAllowed: Allow others to contact me via WeGlide
notEnoughFlights: Please upload a flight and try again.
liveConnectDone: Already connected to {name} in WeGlide Live
compareAnyPilot: Compare with any pilot from the day
flightClaimedTooLate: Flight claimed too late for the contests
